meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6398.

td.p: Colleen McCormick, a graduate student of history from Odenton, Maryland
Steve Van Noord, a third grade teacher from Bellflower, California
Kathy Wright, a bookseller from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $38,398)

tr.td: THE METER IS RUNNING
(Alex: Isn't it always?)
MAKES SENSE--MOVIES EDITION
LEFTOVERS
ANIMAL LOGOS
"WED" BLISS
THE NEXT STATE CAPITAL ALPHABETICALLY
(Alex: We'll give you a state capital. Keep in mind that the next one alphabetically will start with the same letter of the alphabet.)

tr.td: Kathy
Steve
Colleen
PUP-PARAZZI
(Alex: Uh-oh.)
THE CRUSADES

"Q"-LINARY TERMS
